com.rockhoppertech.music.midi.js

Class MIDIUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.rockhoppertech.music.midi.js.MIDIUtils

  • public final class MIDIUtils
extends Object
    Class MidiUtils is a collection of, um, MIDI utilities. JavaSound is a bit difficult to use, so these methods are intented to relieve the pain.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Gene De Lisa

      • textToBytes

        public static byte[] textToBytes(String text)
        Turn a String into an array ob bytes.

        Uses the encoding specified by the encoder. Uses ISO 8859-1.

        Parameters:
        text -
        Returns:
        the encoded text as a byte array

      • bytesToText

        Turn an array of bytes into a String.

        Uses the encoding specified by the decoder. 8859-1.

        Parameters:
        b - a byte array
        Returns:
        a decoded String

      • insertKeySignature

        public static void insertKeySignature(Track track,
                      long tick,
                      int sf,
                      int mi)
        sf = -7: 7 flats sf = -1: 1 flat sf = 0: key of C sf = 1: 1 sharp sf = 7: 7 sharps mi = 0: major key mi = 1: minor key
        Parameters:
        track - a Track
        tick - when to insert the event
        sf - number of sharps or flats -7 to +7
        mi - major or minor 0 = major 1 = minor

      • insertLyric

        public static void insertLyric(Track track,
               long tick,
               String lyric)
        Inserts a lyric at the given tick. each syllable should be a separate lyric event which begins at the event's time.
        Parameters:
        track - a Track
        tick - when to insert the event
        lyric -

      • insertMarker

        public static void insertMarker(Track track,
                long tick,
                String marker)
        Normally in a format 0 track, or the first track in a format 1 file. The name of that point in the sequence, such as a rehearsal letter or section name
        Parameters:
        track - a Track
        tick - when to insert the event
        marker -

      • insertSequenceName

        public static void insertSequenceName(Track track,
                      long tick,
                      String name)
        This is either the sequence or track name in the specification. When read into Sibelius 3, the track 0 name is both the name of the track and title of page. (also from the score info menu button). If in a format 0 track, or the first track in a format 1 file, the name of the sequence. Otherwise, the name of the track.
        Parameters:
        track - a Track
        tick - when to insert the event
        name -

      • insertTimeSignature

        public static void insertTimeSignature(Track track,
                       long tick,
                       int numerator,
                       int denominator)
        Parameters:
        track - a Track
        tick - when to insert the event
        numerator - the time signature numerator
        denominator - needs to be a power that 2 is raised to

      • print

        public static void print(Track track,
         int resolution)
        Logs the track's messages to the logger at debug level. Beats are 1 based, not zero based.
        Parameters:
        track - the track to print
        resolution - the Sequence resolution to calculate beat
